name: Rusty Sidearm
notes: Starting gun of The Hunter. Does not crack secret walls.

name: Marine Sidearm
notes: Starting gun of The Marine. Does not crack secret walls.

name: Rogue Special
notes: Fires short-range, inaccurate lasers. Starting gun of The Pilot. Does not crack secret walls.

name: Budget Revolver
notes: Starting gun of The Convict. Does not crack secret walls.

name: Dart Gun
notes: Fires sticky darts. Starting gun of The Cultist. Does not crack secret walls. Only available in co-op.

name: Robot's Right Hand
notes: Starting gun of The Robot. Does not crack secret walls.

name: Slinger
notes: Starting weapon of The Gunslinger. Reloading an empty clip throws the gun, which has a chance to stun enemies. Does not crack secret walls.

name: Blasphemy
notes: Starting weapon of The Bullet. Swings destroy nearby bullets. At full health, swings send out a piercing sword projectile. Does not crack secret walls.

dps.info: Both the beam and swing deal this damage. If both the beam and the sword hit, they deal 56 damage.

name: Casey
notes: Charged swings reflect nearby bullets. Does not crack secret walls. Increases curse by 2.

name: Pea Shooter
notes: Fires peas.

name: 38 Special
notes: Fires faster right after a dodge roll.

name: Unfinished Gun
notes: Fires piercing bullets.

name: Elimentaler
notes: Inflicts Cheese

name: Bullet
notes: Fires rotating guns which fire bullets as they travel.

name: Shell
notes: Fires three shotguns, each of which fires three bullets upon hitting something.

damage.info: Shotguns: 3 projectiles each dealing 8 damage for a combined total of 24/Shotguns: 3 projectiles each dealing 8 damage for a combined total of 24/Shotguns: 3 projectiles each dealing 8 damage for a combined total of 24/Bullets: 3 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 12/Bullets: 3 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 12/Bullets: 3 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 12

name: Hyper Light Blaster
notes: Has very low ammo, but regenerates 1 ammo if a shot hits an enemy.

name: Boxing Glove
notes: Shoots a boxing glove with a chance to stun. Gains a star each time it kills an enemy, up to 3. When at 3 stars, can be charged to consume the stars and fire a high-damage super punch. Increases curse by 1.

name: Colt 1851
notes: Fires a burst of two bullets.

name: SAA
notes: Fires bouncing bullets that aim towards enemies after bouncing.

name: Cold 45
notes: Inflicts Freezing.

name: Polaris
notes: Has 3 levels. Killing enough enemies causes the gun to level up, increasing its damage. Taking damage decreases its level by 1.

damage.info: Level 1/Level 2: 2 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 10/Level 2: 2 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 10/Level 2: 2 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 10/Level 3

name: Jolter
notes: Fires large and rectangular bullets with high knockback.

name: Dungeon Eagle
notes: Can be charged to fire more powerful shots.

name: Grey Mauser
notes: Reloading an empty clip makes the player invisible. Can be used to steal from shops.

name: Vorpal Gun
notes: Has a chance to fire a critical shot which deals 20 times its damage.

name: High Kaliber
notes: Causes enemy souls to leave their bodies. Touching a soul deals high damage to the enemy. Each shot costs 6 ammo.

name: Shellegun
notes: Reloading alternates between a pistol and a continuous beam. Increases curse by 1.

name: Dueling Pistol
notes: Fires large piercing bullets that bounce twice.

name: AU Gun
notes: Fires a single powerful bullet.

damage.info: 3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21/3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21/3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21

name: Composite Gun
notes: Charged shot consumes all ammo in magazine and will activate a blank effect when it hits a wall.|

name: Flare Gun
notes: Inflicts burning on enemies.

name: Smiley's Revolver
notes:
Decreases shop prices while held.
Fire rate increased shortly after rolling.

name: Shades's Revolver
notes: Increases coolness by 3.

name: Knight's Gun
notes: Fires five bullets in an arrow shape. Gains some pickups when reloading an empty clip.

damage.info: 5 projectiles each dealing 8 damage for a combined total of 40/5 projectiles each dealing 8 damage for a combined total of 40/5 projectiles each dealing 8 damage for a combined total of 40

name: GuNNER
notes: Taking damage while GuNNER is held drains 40 ammo and drops a skull that heals the player upon pickup.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24

name: Big Shotgun
notes: Fires three exploding shots that burst into bullets. Reloading next to Shotgun Kin sucks them up, killing them and restoring 1 ammo.

damage.info: Large Projectiles: 3 projectiles each dealing 5.5 damage for a combined total of 16.5/Large Projectiles: 3 projectiles each dealing 5.5 damage for a combined total of 16.5/Large Projectiles: 3 projectiles each dealing 5.5 damage for a combined total of 16.5/Explosions: 3 explosions each dealing 15 damage for a combined total of 45/Explosions: 3 explosions each dealing 15 damage for a combined total of 45/Explosions: 3 explosions each dealing 15 damage for a combined total of 45/Small Projectiles

name: Old Goldie
notes: Increases coolness by 1.

damage.info: 10 projectiles each dealing 3.5 damage for a combined total of 35/10 projectiles each dealing 3.5 damage for a combined total of 35/10 projectiles each dealing 3.5 damage for a combined total of 35

name: Sawed-Off
notes: Starting gun of The Convict.

damage.info: 4 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 16/4 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 16/4 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 16

name: Winchester
notes: Slightly less bullet spread than the Regular Shotgun

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24

name: Rattler
notes: Simultaneously fires a shotgun blast and a beam that has a chance to poison enemies.

damage.info: 7 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 21/7 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 21/7 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 21

name: Bubble Blaster
notes: Fires bubbles which move slowly towards enemies. Reloading the gun launches bubbles away from the player at high speed.

name: Elephant Gun
notes: Fires a cone spread of bullets with high knockback.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 5.5 damage for a combined total of 33/6 projectiles each dealing 5.5 damage for a combined total of 33/6 projectiles each dealing 5.5 damage for a combined total of 33

name: Tangler
notes: Fires a spread of bouncing bullets. Enemies hit will be folded into a rectangle.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 36/6 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 36/6 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 36

name: Void Shotgun
notes: Fires 6 purple bullets with high knockback.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 30/6 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 30/6 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 30

name: Mass Shotgun
notes: Shoots a large slow projectile that will split up in a barrage of small bullets shortly afterwards.

damage.info: Ball/Split Projectiles: 12 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 72/Split Projectiles: 12 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 72/Split Projectiles: 12 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 72

name: Shotgun Full of Hate
notes: Shoots a spread of shrapnel and poison bullets that leave pools of poison goop.

damage.info: Bullets and Poison Globs: 4 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 24/Bullets and Poison Globs: 4 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 24/Bullets and Poison Globs: 4 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 24/Skull/Nail/Combined damage of all different projectiles, not including poison damage.

name: Shotgun Full of Love
notes: Has a chance to Charm enemies.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 30/6 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 30/6 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 30

name: Shotgrub
notes: Shots leave small pools of poison goop.

damage.info: 5 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 25/5 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 25/5 projectiles each dealing 5 damage for a combined total of 25

name: Gilded Hydra
notes: Fires a large burst of piercing, bouncing bullets. Clip size is increased by 1 for each half heart the player is missing, and healing decreases clip size.

damage.info: 8 projectiles each dealing 7.5 damage for a combined total of 60/8 projectiles each dealing 7.5 damage for a combined total of 60/8 projectiles each dealing 7.5 damage for a combined total of 60

name: Blunderbuss
notes: Fires a short-ranged spray of bullets.

damage.info: 10 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 30/10 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 30/10 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 30

name: Pulse Cannon
notes: Fires a shotgun blast spread of 6 bullets.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24

name: Siren
notes: Fires a shotgun blast of bullets that leave pools of water.  Negates fall damage and goop effects while equipped.

damage.info: 3 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 18/3 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 18/3 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 18

name: Zilla Shotgun
notes: Can be charged to fire the entire magazine at once, which will cause it to fire piercing, bouncing bullets.

damage.info: Uncharged: 8 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 32/Uncharged: 8 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 32/Uncharged: 8 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 32/Charged: 7 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 42/Charged: 7 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 42/Charged: 7 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 42

name: Ice Breaker
notes: The first two shots fire a shotgun blast of ice bullets, and the final shot fires a single explosive shot.

damage.info: Ice Bullets: 5 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 10/Ice Bullets: 5 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 10/Ice Bullets: 5 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 10/Final Slug

name: The Membrane
notes: Fires a shotgun blast of bouncing green bullets that split into more bouncing green bullets.

damage.info: Before Split: 6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/Before Split: 6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/Before Split: 6 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 24/After Split: 16 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 36/After Split: 16 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 36/After Split: 16 projectiles each dealing 3 damage for a combined total of 36

name: Huntsman
notes: Reloading destroys nearby bullets and knocks back enemies. Increases curse by 1.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 3.5 damage for a combined total of 21/6 projectiles each dealing 3.5 damage for a combined total of 21/6 projectiles each dealing 3.5 damage for a combined total of 21

name: Blooper
notes: Deals 20% less damage to Bosses.

damage.info: To Regular Enemies: 6 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 42/To Regular Enemies: 6 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 42/To Regular Enemies: 6 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 42/To Bosses: 6 projectiles each dealing 5.6 damage for a combined total of 33.6/To Bosses: 6 projectiles each dealing 5.6 damage for a combined total of 33.6/To Bosses: 6 projectiles each dealing 5.6 damage for a combined total of 33.6

name: JK-47
notes: Reloading inflicts fear on nearby enemies.

name: Bow
notes: Fully charged shots pierce.

name: Charmed Bow
notes: Charms enemies when fully charged.|

name: Crossbow
notes: Fires bolts. Starting gun of The Hunter.

name: Sticky Crossbow
notes: Fires bolts that stick to enemies and explode upon reloading.

name: Shotbow
notes: Fires a shotgun blast of bolts.

name: Triple Crossbow
notes: Reloading alternates between triple bolts and single bolts that slow enemies.

damage.info: Slowing Bolts/Triple Bolts: 3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21/Triple Bolts: 3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21/Triple Bolts: 3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21

name: Crescent Crossbow
notes: Fires stars that split into smaller bouncing stars.

name: Gunbow
notes: Fires a fast, piercing projectile that ricochets many times.

name: Klobbe
notes: Rapidly fires low-damage bullets.

name: Strafe Gun
notes: Fires nails that explode upon releasing the trigger.

name: AKEY-47
notes: Opening a locked chest or door with the gun equipped opens it for free. Alternatively, shooting a locked chest or door unlocks it.

name: Stone Dome
notes: Sits on the player's head and rapidly fires homing bullets. While held, inflicts fear on nearby enemies. Increases curse by 1.

name: Crown of Guns
notes: Sits atop the player's head and fires bullets in all directions.

name: M16
notes: Reloading alternates between bursts of 3 bullets and a grenade launcher.

name: Combined Rifle
notes: Reloading alternates between a rapid-fire rifle and a bouncing, piercing energy ball.

name: Zorgun
notes: Rapidly fires homing bullets. The final bullet in each clip fires a random explosive (grenade, rocket, or drill).

name: The Fat Line
notes: Fires purple bullets, which start at the wall the gun is aimed at and travel back towards the gun. Bullets will curve and home in on enemies as they travel.

name: Mr. Accretion Jr.
notes: Fires planets which start orbiting the player if they hit a wall or obstacle.

name: VertebraeK-47
notes: Bullets close to each other will form links between each other, which hurts enemies on touch.

name: Balloon Gun
notes: Fires small homing tornadoes. While held, grants flight but loses all ammo on taking damage.

name: MAC10
notes: Fires a burst of four bullets.

name: Triple Gun
notes: Changes form based on how much ammo it has left.

name: Heck Blaster
notes: Rapidly fires invisible bullets. Jammed enemies hit will revert to normal.

name: Patriot
notes:
Fires piercing bullets.
Fire rate increases rapidly as the trigger is held.

name: AC-15
notes: Becomes more powerful if the player has armor.

name: Plague Pistol
notes: Bullets create poison puddles on impact.

name: Gungine
notes: Greatly increases movement speed while held. Reloading clears nearby goop and refills the gun's ammo. Gets fire immune while held.

name: The Predator
notes: Locks onto enemies and fires high speed homing lasers.  Invisibility while reloading an empty magazine.

name: Dragunfire
notes: Rapidly fires burning bullets that have a chance to inflict Burn.

name: Sniper Rifle
notes: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

name: A.W.P.
notes: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

name: M1
notes: Fires high-speed piercing bullets.

name: Corsair
notes: Fires slow, bouncing bullets that accelerate and curve towards enemies before exploding.

name: Railgun
notes: Fires a fast-moving piercing bullet that bounces many times.

name: Prototype Railgun
notes: Fires a fast-moving piercing bullet.

name: Deck4rd
notes: Fires a single powerful bullet that will explode upon impact.

name: The Judge
notes: The final shot of each clip has a chance to explode, poison, freeze or ignite enemies.

name: Mourning Star
notes: Calls down a controllable orbital laser.

name: Alien Sidearm
notes: Charged shots are larger and deal more damage.

name: RUBE-ADYNE Prototype
notes: Fires lasers that bounce four times.

name: RUBE-ADYNE MK.II
notes: Fires bouncing lasers with limited range.

name: Rubenstein's Monster
notes: Created when both RUBE-ADYNE Prototype and RUBE-ADYNE MK.II are picked up. Rapidly fires bouncing lasers.

name: Chamber Gun
notes: Transforms based on the current chamber.

name: Gunderfury
notes: Gains persist experience and levels up with kills, changing its appearance and stats.

name: Mine Cutter
notes: Reloading alternates between firing three small, piercing, parallel lasers and single large lasers.

name: Void Core Assault Rifle
notes: Fires bursts of three lasers.

name: Flash Ray
notes: Shoots piercing lasers with a chance to stun.

name: Wind Up Gun
notes: In each magazine, the first 10 bullets pierce. The last 10 deal half damage.

name: H4mmer
notes: Fires a barrage of bullets. The last shot in the magazine is a hammer, which deals extra damage and can stun enemies.

name: Snakemaker
notes: Has a chance to transmogrify enemies into snakes.

name: Turbo-Gun
notes: Damage increases for the next magazine depending on the number of reload attempts during its reload.

name: Hegemony Carbine
notes: Shoots rapid fire white bolts of energy.

name: Screecher
notes: Rapidly fires piercing sound waves that have a small chance to stun.

name: Laser Lotus
notes: Fires piercing lasers.

name: Hegemony Rifle
notes: Rapidly fires inaccurate white lasers.

name: Fightsabre
notes: Reloading swings the gun around, reflecting nearby bullets. Increases curse by 2.

name: Helix
notes: Fires two bullets in a helix pattern.

damage.info: 2 projectiles each dealing 7.5 damage for a combined total of 15/2 projectiles each dealing 7.5 damage for a combined total of 15/2 projectiles each dealing 7.5 damage for a combined total of 15

name: Laser Rifle
notes: Fires a burst of three lasers.

name: Crestfaller
notes: Inflicts Freeze.

name: Rad Gun
notes: Increases coolness by 2. When reloading, if the reload button is hit at the right time, the gun's damage is increased. Failing a reload resets the damage.

name: Thunderclap
notes: Fires balls of lightning.

name: Charge Shot
notes: Fires a large laser that pierces enemies and bounces off of walls two times. Laser deals higher damage after bouncing.

name: Dark Marker
notes: Charge shot consumes the entire clip to create a room-wide explosion and blank effect.

name: Particulator
notes: Fires a large bullet, which will split into 10 bullets which seek out enemies.

name: The Emperor
notes: Fires a burst of four bullets connected by electricity.

name: RPG
notes: Fires grenades.

name: Grenade Launcher
notes: Shoots a grenade that bounces off of surfaces and explodes on impact with enemies.

name: Stinger
notes: Fires a group of bees, and an explosive rocket which bursts into even more homing bees on detonation.

name: The Exotic
notes: Fires rockets which burst into more homing rockets. While held, grants a ghost companion that follows the player and reveals the contents of nearby chests.

damage.info: Rocket Impact/Explosion/Mini Rocket Impact/Mini Rocket Explosion

name: Com4nd0
notes: Fires homing rockets.

name: RC Rocket
notes: Fires rockets guided by the player's cursor.

name: Yari Launcher
notes: Rapidly fires homing rockets. Bypasses the boss DPS cap.

name: Lil' Bomber
notes: Fires a bomb that bounces off of walls and explodes on enemy contact.

name: Grasschopper
notes: Fires a single powerful blast that releases a small blank effect.

damage.info: Both the projectile impact and the explosion dead 20 damage, dealing 40 damage if both hit.

name: Void Core Cannon
notes: Fires bursts of four large energy balls, which home in on enemies and explode upon impact.

damage.info: Both the projectile impact and the explosion dead 20 damage, dealing 20 damage if both hit.

name: Bundle of Wands
notes: Has a chance to transmogrify.

damage.info: 3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21/3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21/3 projectiles each dealing 7 damage for a combined total of 21

name: Staff of Firepower
notes: Reloading alternates between a rapid fire pistol and a beam weapon that can set enemies on fire.

name: Witch Pistol
notes: Fires bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.

name: Hexagun
notes: Fires piercing bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.

name: Phoenix
notes: Shooting creates a small cone of fire in front of the player that burns enemies.

name: Magic Lamp
notes: Hitting an enemy three times summons a genie to punch them.

name: Teapot
notes: While reloading, ignites nearby enemies.

name: Gunslinger's Ashes
notes: Fires slow homing ghosts that shoot and deal contact damage.

name: Luxin Cannon
notes: Fires laser shots at enemies. The last bullet of magazine fires a crystal, which splits into 5 small crystals on impact.

name: Gunther
notes: Cannot be used to reveal hidden walls. Grows stronger with each room cleared.

name: Unicorn Horn
notes: Fires a rainbow beam that homes in on enemies. Increases curse by 1.

name: Cobalt Hammer
notes: Fires blue lasers. Charging the weapon makes it fire lasers in four directions.

damage.info: Uncharged/Charged mass room damage and radial lasers

name: Frost Giant
notes: Has a large icy muzzleflash that freezes enemies.

name: Bullet Bore
notes: Fires drills that home in on enemies, stun them, and explode after a short delay.

name: Cat Claw
notes: Fires darts that home in on enemies and explode after a short delay. The darts deal minimal damage on contact.

name: Megahand
notes: Has 2 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.

name: Demon Head
notes: Fires a continuous beam that has a chance to inflict Burn and slightly homes in on enemies.

name: Heroine
notes: Has 3 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.

name: Mutation
notes: Fires a continuous beam and heavily pushes back the player.

name: Flame Hand
notes: Fires fireballs that pierce enemies and have a chance to set enemies on fire.

damage.info: Deals 2d6 x 1.3846 + 2 damage, with an approximate average damage of 11.7

name: Sunlight Javelin
notes: Shoots fiery javelins that ignite enemies.

name: Machine Fist
notes: Reloading alternates between firing a gatling gun, and a single shot exploding rocket punch that is guided by the player's reticle. The rocket punch consumes 10 ammo upon firing.

name: Robot's Left Hand
notes: Rapidly fires blue lasers.

name: Snowballer
notes: Fires snowballs that freeze enemies.

name: Super Meat Gun
notes: Fires piercing, bouncing saw blades. Slightly increases movement speed and gives a heart container.

name: Anvillain
notes: Fires piercing anvils with high knockback and a chance to stun.

name: Fossilized Gun
notes: Fires a stream of oil. Reloading spits fire, which can ignite the oil.

name: Gamma Ray
notes: Fires a green laser that slightly curves towards enemies and can poison.

name: Freeze Ray
notes: Fires a blue laser that has a chance to freeze enemies.

name: Science Cannon
notes: Fires a large laser after a short charge-up, which inflicts random status effects on enemies.

name: Disintegrator
notes: Fires a large laser after a long charge-up.

name: Proton Backpack
notes: Fires a homing laser.

name: Mega Douser
notes: Fires a stream of water.

name: Plunger
notes: Fires a stream of poison. Has a chance to poison enemies and leaves poison puddles on impact.

name: Raiden Coil
notes: Fires a laser that homes in on all on-screen enemies.

name: Moonscraper
notes: Fires a beam that reflects off of solid objects once.

name: Barrel
notes: Fires a fish that has a chance to stun and leaves a pool of water on impact.

name: Trick Gun
notes: Reloading transforms the gun between a pistol and a shotgun.

damage.info: Pistol/Shotgun: 8 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 16/Shotgun: 8 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 16/Shotgun: 8 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 16

name: Mailbox
notes: Fires mail at enemies. The last bullet of each magazine is a package, which can explode, leave confetti, burn, or poison.

name: Nail Gun
notes: Fires a rapid stream of low damage nails. Fires faster if fire button is tapped rather than held.

name: Light Gun
notes: Fires zaps of light at enemies. The last bullet in the magazine is a duck, which will automatically seek out the nearest enemy and attack them.

name: Wood Beam
notes: Melee weapon that extends itself to hit enemies. Increases curse by 1.

damage.info: Impact damage is based on swing speed, with a maximum of 26

name: Mahoguny
notes: Fires bouncing explosive seed cones and several leaves.

name: The Scrambler
notes: Fires bullets that hatch into many homing bullets upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

damage.info: Egg/Seekers: 5 projectiles each dealing 9 damage for a combined total of 45/Seekers: 5 projectiles each dealing 9 damage for a combined total of 45/Seekers: 5 projectiles each dealing 9 damage for a combined total of 45

name: Trashcannon
notes: Fires a trash bag that explodes into poison projectiles that leave trails of poison goop.

damage.info: Trash Bag/Poison Shrapnel: 6 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 36/Poison Shrapnel: 6 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 36/Poison Shrapnel: 6 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 36

name: Glacier
notes: Fires bouncing ice cubes that explode and freeze enemies.

name: Origuni
notes: Fires paper planes that follow the player's crosshair.

name: The Kiln
notes: Fires pots that break into 3 bouncing crystals upon hitting something.

damage.info: Pots/Crystal Shrapnel: 3 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 12/Crystal Shrapnel: 3 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 12/Crystal Shrapnel: 3 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 12

name: Skull Spitter
notes: Fires homing skulls.

name: Buzzkill
notes: Fires piercing, bouncing sawblades.

name: Tear Jerker
notes: Fires tears that leave behind puddles of water.

name: Starpew
notes: Fires water droplets. Can be charged to increase the number of droplets fired.

name: Eye of the Beholster
notes: The last shot of each clip spawns a friendly Beadie.

name: Molotov Launcher
notes: Fires molotovs that create fire puddles on impact.

name: Glass Cannon
notes: Fires a powerful beam. Loses all ammo upon taking damage.

name: Shock Rifle
notes: Fires a zap of electricity.

name: Bait Launcher
notes: Fires a steak that causes a tiger to appear and maul the target.

name: Brick Breaker
notes: Fires piercing turtle shells that bounce off of walls.

name: Betrayer's Shield
notes: Upon reloading, leaves a protective shield on the ground. Players in that area will be protected until the shield has absorbed a number of bullets.

name: Lower Case r
notes: Fires a burst of 6 bullets that spell out the word bullet.

name: Excaliber
notes: Fires a burst of three piercing sword projectiles. Reloading swings the sword, destroying nearby bullets and damaging nearby enemies. Increases curse by 2.5.

name: Face Melter
notes: Simultaneously fires music notes in four directions. Places an amplifier on the ground at the player's position upon reloading. Whenever the Face Melter is fired, the amplifier will fire music notes in the same pattern. Reloading again will remove the amplifier and place a new one.

damage.info: 4 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 16/4 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 16/4 projectiles each dealing 4 damage for a combined total of 16

name: Really Special Lute
notes: Fires in a very wide spread. Buffs the player's companions. Chance to Charm enemies.

damage.info: 7 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 42/7 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 42/7 projectiles each dealing 6 damage for a combined total of 42

name: Trident
notes: Fires a long-range laser that pierces one enemy. Destroys nearby bullets and pushes enemies away while reloading.

name: Kruller Glaive
notes: Throws a boomerang-like projectile that homes in on multiple enemies, damaging and sometimes stunning them.

name: Abyssal Tentacle
notes: Fires a tentacle that homes in on and grips enemies, damaging them.

name: Quad Laser
notes: Fires a large, square, extremely slow bullet.

name: Tetrominator
notes: Fires random tetrominoes that stick to enemies. Line pieces explode, dealing more damage the more tetrominoes are stuck to an enemy.

name: Pitchfork
notes: Fires piercing fireballs that burn.

name: Evolver
notes: Killing enemies evolves the gun through 6 forms.

name: Gungeon Ant
notes: In oil mode, creates oil puddles on impact. In fire mode, fires fireballs that pierce and burn. Reloading switches modes.

damage.info: Oil Shots: 3 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 6/Oil Shots: 3 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 6/Oil Shots: 3 projectiles each dealing 2 damage for a combined total of 6/Fire Shots: 3 projectiles each dealing 1.5 damage for a combined total of 4.5/Fire Shots: 3 projectiles each dealing 1.5 damage for a combined total of 4.5/Fire Shots: 3 projectiles each dealing 1.5 damage for a combined total of 4.5

name: Life Orb
notes: After killing an enemy, reloading damages all enemies in the room.

name: Alien Engine
notes: Rapid fire weapon that has a very short range, only damaging enemies that come into contact with the muzzle flash. Enemies damaged have a chance to catch on fire. Extremely high recoil.

name: Microtransaction Gun
notes: Shoots various figurines, books, and gems at the cost of 1 per shot.

damage.info: Artbook and Bag of Money/Bullet Kin Plush/Green Gem, Pilot, Hunter, and Convict Figurines/Marine Figurine

name: Poxcannon
notes: Shoots poisonous t-shirts with high knockback. Poisoned enemies create a poison puddle on death.

name: T-Shirt Cannon
notes: Fires t-shirts that have high knockback.

name: Banana
notes: Fires an explosive banana that sends out three more bouncing explosive bananas.

name: Bee Hive
notes: Fires bees that home in on and damage enemies.

name: Silencer
notes: Fires zippers. Hitting an enemy with the swing of the weapon will stun the enemy.

name: Camera
notes: Damages all enemies in the room, with a chance to stun.

name: Directional Pad
notes: Fires bullets in four directions. Combos can be entered to fire fireballs or a grappling hook. After running out of ammo, it is destroyed but spawns a chest.

name: 3rd Party Controller
notes: Upon hitting an enemy, they will move in the same direction the player moves, and shoot towards the crosshair if the player shoots.

name: Gunzheng
notes: Rapidly fires inaccurate, piercing, homing arrows.

name: Sling
notes: Fires bouncing rocks. Deals 2.5x damage to bosses and 2x damage after bouncing.

name: Cactus
notes: Fires needles.

name: Black Hole Gun
notes: Fires black holes that attract enemies and enemy bullets.

name: BSG
notes: Slowly charges up to fire a large high-damage projectile.

name: Compressed Air Tank
notes: Fires sharks that swim around the room, seeking enemies and biting them.

name: Serious Cannon
notes: Fires large bouncing cannonballs.

name: Makeshift Cannon
notes: Fires a single blast that deals a large amount of damage.

damage.info: 6 projectiles each dealing 200 damage for a combined total of 1200/6 projectiles each dealing 200 damage for a combined total of 1200/6 projectiles each dealing 200 damage for a combined total of 1200

name: Devolver
notes: Has a chance to devolve enemies into simpler enemies.

name: Finished Gun
notes: Replaces Unfinished Gun once the Ammonomicon is complete.
